DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , placebo-controled , randomized trial investigate aspirin pre-treatment anti-inflammatory effect model acute lung injury induce inhaled endotoxin ( LPS ) healthy human volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Aspirin REducing iNflammation Human Vivo Model Acute Lung Injury
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject Age < 18 year Pregnancy breast feed woman childbearing potential use adequate contraception . Participation clinical trial investigational medicinal product within 30 day Consent decline Aspirin non steroidal antiinflammatory ( NSAID ) use past 4 week History asthma Known aspirin NSAID hypersensitivity History peptic ulcer disease Platelet count < 150 x 106/ml Aspirin resistance
